ygData.subject: Re: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hello. Banshee Aura uses a 5 plat perl as the focus. This you just buy once and keep on you. It is the leather skin lev 16 spell that uses the cat s eye
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> I bought feign death in Neriak, I've also seen it for sale in
> both Qeynos
> and Freeport. Definitely get this spell, it's saved my hide
> on numerous
> occasions. I don't have banshee aura yet, and I'm not sure
> if I'll get it
> or not, as I don't melee much now anyway, that plus the need
> for the cat's
> eye agates has me a bit turned off on it.
>

Hello.

Banshee Aura uses a 5 plat perl as the focus. This you just buy once and
keep on you. It is the leather skin lev 16 spell that uses the cat's eye
agates. By higher levels when you have the upgrade or 2 for this spell, you
will also have the funds to keep it powered up. Least that is what I hear.

Sincerely,

Mortifer - Humble Knight - MoltenLava

AKA - Eloric - Necromancer Rank 5
- Veneficus - Magician Rank 5
